ENTRY       G00111                      Glycan
NAME        GD1a
COMPOSITION (Gal)2 (GalNAc)1 (Glc)1 (Neu5Ac)2 (Cer)1
MASS        1272.1 (Cer)
REMARK      Same as: C04927
REACTION    R05942 R05943 R05945 R06000 R06253
PATHWAY     map00604  Glycosphingolipid biosynthesis - ganglio series
            map01100  Metabolic pathways
ENZYME      2.4.99.2        2.4.99.4        2.4.99.8        3.2.1.18
ORTHOLOGY   K03368  beta-galactoside alpha-2,3-sialyltransferase (sialyltransferase 4B) [EC:2.4.99.4]
            K03369  alpha-N-acetyl-neuraminate alpha-2,8-sialyltransferase (sialyltransferase 8E) [EC:2.4.99.-]
            K03376  N-acetylgalactosaminide alpha-2,6-sialyltransferase (sialyltransferase 7F) [EC:2.4.99.-]
BRITE       Lipids [BR:br08002]
             SP  Sphingolipids
              SP06 Acidic glycosphingolipids
               SP0601 Gangliosides
                G00111  Neu5Ac-alpha2->3Gal-beta1->3GalNAc-beta1->4(Neu5Ac-alpha2->3)Gal-beta1->4Glc-beta1->1'Cer (GD1a)
REFERENCE   1  [PMID:7553668]

            J. Biol. Chem. 280 (2005) 4730-7.
